00029 #ifndef _CBRFRAME_H
00030 #define _CBRFRAME_H
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 
00034 //tolua_begin
00035 class cbrframe: public in1out
00036 {
00037       typedef in1out baseclass;
00038    public:
00039       cbrframe();
00040       ~cbrframe();      
00041       int act(void);
00042       void restim(void);
00043       rec_typ send_state;
00044       tim_typ send_time; // time for next request if stopped
00045       size_t pkt_len; // length of frames to be send
00046       tim_typ delta;  // send interval
00047       size_t bytes;  // number of bytes to be send
00048       size_t sent;  // number of bytes sent
00049       tim_typ StartTime; // Sim time to start sending
00050       tim_typ EndTime; // Sim time to finish sending
00051       int connID;
00052 //tolua_end
00053             
00054       void early(event *);
00055       rec_typ REC(data *, int); // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00056 };  //tolua_export
00057 
00058 #endif // _CBRFRAME_H
